short_description: fastpath function to calculate silhouette score for the clustered data.
long_description: fastpath function to calculate silhouette score for the clustered data.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains clustered data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains clustered data.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: IdColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the column which is unique identifier of input rows.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the column which is unique identifier of input rows.

argument_clauses.name: ClusterIdColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the column containing assigned clusterIds for input data point.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the column containing assigned clusterIds for input data point.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the columns/features to be used for calculating silhouette score.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the columns/features to be used for calculating silhouette score.

argument_clauses.name: OutputType
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the output type/format as follows:: SCORE: Outputs Average Silhouette Score, SAMPLE_SCORES: Outputs Silhouette Score for each input sample, CLUSTER_SCORES: Outputs Average Silhouette Score for each cluster.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the output type/format as follows:: SCORE: Outputs Average Silhouette Score, SAMPLE_SCORES: Outputs Silhouette Score for each input sample, CLUSTER_SCORES: Outputs Average Silhouette Score for each cluster.
